comment:
* This class is used by the assistant application to know what went wrong during using the
 * {@link HotwordDetector} and which action that the application should take. When an error occurs
 * from Dsp hotword detection, software hotword detection and {@link HotwordDetectionService}, the
 * system will send {@link HotwordDetectionServiceFailure} which contains the error code, error
 * message and the suggested action to help the assistant application to take the next action.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: * An error code which means an unknown error occurs.

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_BIND_FAILURE
variables.comment: * Indicates that the system server binds hotword detection service failure.

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_BINDING_DIED
variables.comment: * Indicates that the hotword detection service is dead.

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_COPY_AUDIO_DATA_FAILURE
variables.comment: * Indicates to copy audio data failure for external source detection.

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_DETECT_TIMEOUT
variables.comment: * Indicates that the detection service doesnâ€™t respond to the detection result before timeout.

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_ON_DETECTED_SECURITY_EXCEPTION
variables.comment: * Indicates that the security exception occurs in #onDetected method.

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_ON_DETECTED_STREAM_COPY_FAILURE
variables.comment: * Indicates to copy the audio stream failure in #onDetected method.

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_REMOTE_EXCEPTION
variables.comment: * Indicates that the remote exception occurs when calling callback method.

variables.name: ERROR_CODE_SHUTDOWN_HDS_ON_VOICE_ACTIVATION_OP_DISABLED
variables.comment:
Indicates shutdown of {@link HotwordDetectionService} due to voice activation op being
     * disabled.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
